function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Managers participating in congresses have access to knowledge and resources, creating a bias in the sample.","Impact":"Sample may not be representative of general park management situations, leading to skewed conclusions.","Mitigation":"Expand the sample to include managers who do not participate in congresses to get a more balanced view of park management situations.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis and sampling techniques to ensure representative samples.","People":"Managers who do not participate in congresses or associations.","Owner":"Research and data collection teams."},{"Description":"Lack of channels for managers who do not participate in associations or events to access different strategies or experiences.","Impact":"Managers may miss out on valuable knowledge and resources, leading to less effective park management.","Mitigation":"Develop channels for non-participating managers to access information and resources, such as online platforms or local knowledge sharing events.","Technologies":"Online knowledge platforms, local knowledge sharing events.","People":"Managers who do not participate in associations or events.","Owner":"Association leaders, local government, knowledge sharing organizations."}]}
